title: "Since you guys don't like RNG"
body:
" We are going to put critical chance at all items, so ADC's have close to 100% critical chance. Since they will crit every AA , crit is no longer a RNG stat."
Rito 2015

yup, free 15% lifesteal off of all critical attacks courtasy of the new masteries!

I mean, I understand it's going to be broken on him, but calling it "free" would be the same as calling all the other masteries free. There's plenty of broken-ish masteries at the moment.

*shrugs*

Free as opposed to investing 675 gold into lifesteal of an equivalent value via in game items.

Of course it requires choosing that mastery, and it's not like nobody else can utilize it, it is just exceptionally good for him (not to forget other champs who would abuse it more, like Fiora, Tryndamere, Shaco, etc.)

> [{quoted}](name=junglerboy16,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hvzmt2pv,comment-id=000200010000000000010001,timestamp=2015-11-01T21:21:33.240+0000)

> 
> Of course it requires choosing that mastery, and it's not like nobody else can utilize it, it is just exceptionally good for him (not to forget other champs who would abuse it more, like Fiora, Tryndamere, Shaco, etc.)

It's so easy for ADCs to get 100% crit now though. So yes, there's tons of other champions who can use it. Not to mention Yasuo himself does less damage on crits than anyone else in the game thanks to his passive reducing the damage of his crits. But lets not forget that choosing that mastery means you can't choose the mastery that gives you up to 80 extra damage on-hit in the lategame (which would benefit Yasuo or anyone else who autos a lot greatly), or the mastery that burns your opponent for a percent of your bonus AD and total AP.

I think the bonus on hit damage is going to be stronger on champions that have on hit builds for hybrid damage than on ADCs or something. I'm thinking probably {{champion:17}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:2}} top get a lot from it and top/sated jg {{champion:5}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:11}} get good use. Maybe {{champion:126}}  or {{champion:96}} use it bc the first doesn't build early crit top/mid, but has the 100% attack speed to make it decent burst if he gets it stacked through poke then uses the steroid to chunk his opponent and the second gets 5 autos per second w/ reduced AD (so less heal, more value for on hit) and when he does that he will be sort of stuck w/ his position bc he hit so fast he can't auto move and use the AS so initial positioning and the team protect while he just shreds everything will be more important than sustaining and kiting (if he's not protected he'll be bursted and heal won't matter). 400 bonus damage per second on kog doesn't sound like a huge amount though given how much his autos will do already, but I think it might be more valuable than the heal.

The 1-8 bonus damage on autos that stacks 10 times.... sated jg all say thank you. Yeah BOTRK is nerfed, but 2 autos will give 18% hp damage, 48-240 damage from mastery at max level, 150 from devourer, plus any kit abilities. If shyvana can land her e on targets in dragon form, her Q will instantly proc 7.5% max hp magic damage, 150 magic damage, 18% current hp physical damage, 2 autos each +100% ad physical damage, plus 48-240 magic physical damage from the mastery..... IN A LINE. That's 25% hp plus what, 400 damage minimum (200 from on hits, plus another 200 in autos+the bonus ad maybe) in hybrid damage? Line up 2-3 champs who you hit w/ the cone E and that's a pretty big chunk of damage from Q considering you probably auto, q, auto the first champ in the line so they take that twice.
I wonder how that mastery works with anivia....
